entry.source: 〉 The demon seems to have lost its{F801}mind. The only way to stop it is to{F801}defeat it and hope it calms down.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon seems to have lost its{F801}mind. The only way to stop it is to{F801}defeat it and hope it calms down.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon has returned to its{F801}senses...{F801}{F802}〉 The light of sanity returns to its{F801}eyes...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon has returned to its{F801}senses...{F801}{F802}〉 The light of sanity returns to its{F801}eyes...{F801}
